Game specifications and contents

---------------------------------------------------------

It follows me from a game of survival horror games and ancient Arabic hieroglyphic puzzles. The game contains graphics quality of up to 1K, and it has medium-power artificial intelligence, and there are terrifying models that are not suitable for the weak-hearted because of artificial intelligence, and it does not contain ads or anything paid and  It has old Arabic music that raises your desire to play it, and if you encounter any problem, you should contact the technical support means or the developers. We will leave you the links at the end of the article. It is a game developed by three studios. You will see their pictures on the page.  Or escape from the cemetery guard, and you must escape and hide from the cemetery guard, because if he finds you, he will kill you (warning the game is not for the faint-hearted), and when you solve the puzzle and pass the stage, work will be done on the second part of the game and here we have finished the article and wait for more and more  next is better
